name: SisApp
description: Client for asking questions made by CBITs/MSS
author: Mark Begale

scripts.init: npm install && npm_config_env=test npm_config_server=http://127.0.0.1:3000 npm run set_endpoint && npm run set_endpoint && npm run build:prepare && npm run browser:add_platform && npm run android:add_platform && npm run add_plugins
scripts.set_endpoint: echo "{\"environment\":\"$npm_config_env\",\"server\":\"$npm_config_server\"}" > src/config.json && sed s%ACCESS_ORIGIN%$npm_config_server%g config > config.xml
scripts.android:add_platform: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform remove android && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add android@4.0.0
scripts.android:build: npm run build:prepare && npm run add_plugins && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova build android
scripts.browser:add_platform: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform remove browser && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add browser && npm run add_plugins
scripts.add_plugins: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove org.apache.cordova.device; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.device; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove org.apache.cordova.network-information; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.network-information; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-whitelist.git; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-whitelist.git; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification; ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification@0.8.2;
scripts.build:all: npm run browser:build && npm run android:build
scripts.build:prepare:
[ ! -f src/config.json ] && echo '--- missing src/config.json ---
--- configure a sis_dashboard server url with a variation of the following:
--- npm_config_env=test npm_config_server=http://127.0.0.1:3000 npm run set_endpoint' && exit 1; npm run build:clean && npm run eslint:src && cp src/index.html www/ && mkdir www/content && cp src/content/* www/content/ && cp -r src/js/* www/js/ && cp -r src/css/* www/css/ && cp ./node_modules/angular/angular.min.js www/js/ && cp ./node_modules/angular-route/angular-route.min.js www/js/ && cp ./node_modules/angular-resource/angular-resource.min.js www/js/ && mkdir www/partials/ && cp -r src/partials/* www/partials/ && mkdir -p www/vendor/css/ && cp -r src/vendor/css/* www/vendor/css/ && mkdir -p www/vendor/js/ && cp -r src/vendor/js/* www/vendor/js/ &&  mkdir -p www/vendor/css/font-awesome/fonts && cp -r ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* www/vendor/css/font-awesome/fonts && mkdir -p www/vendor/css/font-awesome/css && cp ./node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css www/vendor/css/font-awesome/css && cp ./node_modules/moment/moment.js www/js/ && cp ./src/config.json ./www/config.json && mkdir -p www/vendor/font/ && cp -r src/vendor/font/* www/vendor/font/  && mkdir -p www/vendor/fonts/ && cp -r src/vendor/fonts/* www/vendor/fonts/
